Enroll to Fly

Get to the skies and experience flying like never before. Sign up and start your training to become a pilot. Fill out the form to get started.

Why Fly at NVFlight?

Your success is our priority. Learning to fly is a transformative experience, and we are dedicated to providing you with the knowledge, skills, and support you need to reach new heights.

Programs to Fit Your Schedule

We offer full-time and part-time programs to match your schedule, whether you're training for a career or for recreation.

Start Your Career

Many of our students have trained with us and successfully transitioned to airline careers. This is your opportunity to take flight!

Our Programs

Your aviation dreams take center stage here. Whether pursuing a professional career, building flight hours, or seeking leisurely adventure, we have the perfect path for you.

Private Pilot

Your passport to the skies! Learn to pilot your dreams with our Private Pilot Course.

Explore

Instrument Rating

Navigate through clouds and the skies with precision through our Instrument Rating course.

Explore

Commercial Pilot

Start your pilot career with our Commercial Pilot Course. Your path to the captain's seat is here.

Explore

Multi-Engine Instructor

Explore

NVFlight Flight School in Reno, NV, provides top-quality flight training for aspiring pilots. Whether you're looking to earn your private pilot license, instrument rating, or commercial pilot certificate, our experienced instructors and well-maintained fleet will help you achieve your aviation goals. We also offer multi-engine training and flight instructor certification. Start your journey with NVFlight today!
